Message.Msg: Coca cola just popped up on my raider and i am entering a long position. I am a short term trader, i use various technical tools and indicators to form an opinion about a stock. Coca cola is for sure a short term buy play. All the indicators are pointing at a strong buy. Anyone that is lucky enough to jump on will be very satisfied with the profits!!!

Topic.Title: buy buy buy ko $50 next week.

Message.Msg: hahaha someone posted a article saying KO will drop? are you kidding me?? why don't you put you money where you mouth is!! First of all that article is written my idiots. Who ever thinks that coca cola is a penny stock....please so slap yourself in the face, oh be sure to do it in front of the mirror, this way you feel the pain AND see it!! Do you realize what has been going on time and sales?? Big guys with deep pockets are buying and buying large! These fools think they can dump a stock. To manipulate a company like this you need a few hundred million, anyone posting on this site does not have that sort of cash. If they did, they would be non-existent in this mere mortal world. Please stop with the nonsense! here is a tip, buy if you can otherwise stay out...unless you have no problem losing your shirt, pants and underwear!

Well it's hard to catch a falling knife but it's at or near oversold status. If the market looks stable tomorrow might be a good time to buy. I don't think it falls all the way to the 200 day MA unless the broader market corrects with it. Put in a limit order as low as you dare and it will likely bounce if it fills.
